datafield.subfield: Kitāb al-Durūs fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qawāfī,
Shelfmark: Ann Arbor, University of Michigan, Special Collections Library, Isl. Ms. 950

Origin: Lacks dated colophon though dated ownership statement on 'title page' (p.1) provides a rough terminus ante quem of 1775 and number of prior owners, paper, hand, etc. would suggest early to mid-18th or even late 17th century.
Former shelfmark: Mich. Isl. Ms. temp. no. 99

Binding: Pasteboards covered in paper printed with shell 'marbled' design in blue, dark blue, red, and yellow with red leather over spine and fore edge flap ; Type II binding (with flap) ; pastedowns and flyleaves in untinted wove paper ; resewn in white thread, two stations ; overall in somewhat poor condition with abrasion, lifting and losses of paper and leather, delamination of boards, etc. ; fully detached from textblock.

Support: European laid paper with 7-8 laid lines per cm. (horizontal), chain lines spaced 23-24 mm. apart (vertical), and crown-star-crescent watermark (see p.24, 36, etc.) ; well-burnished to glossy, cream in color, fairly thick and sturdy.
Decoration: Keywords, section headings, and abbreviation symbols (mainly two-teeth stroke overlining keywords) rubricated ; diagrams.

Script: Naskh ; clear, spacious Egyptian hand in a medium line ; mainly serifless with slight effect of tilt to the left, curvilinear descenders, pointing mainly in distinct dots but three dots represented by curved stroke, occasional vocalization, alif maqṣūrah often pointed as yāʼ.
Layout: Written mainly in 17 lines per page, written area occasionally divided to columns ; frame-ruled.

Collation: i, 2 V(20), VII (34), V (44), VI+3 (59), i ; 'quire numbering' in the form of whole words appears on the recto of every tenth leaf (as though quinions, but does not correspond to current sewing/gatherings) ; catchwords present ; pagination in pencil, Western numerals, supplied during digitization.
Explicit: "واما العتابا فان الالف واللام تعاقب التنوين فكان التنوين موجود فيه"

Incipit: [al-Bāb fī ʻilm al-ʻarūḍ ] "قال الشيخ الامام ابو محمد سعيد بن المبارك النحوي رحمه الله الشعر لفظ موزون مقفا [مقفى] يدل على معنى واشتقاقه من شعرت بالشيء اذا علمت به ..." ; [Jumlah mukhtaṣarah fī ʻilm al-qawāfī] "هذه جملة مختصرة في علم القوافي تليق بهذا المختصر من العروض يتضمن زيد علمها مع كثير من التعديل وكثير الاتسشهادات ..." ; [al-Fuṣūl fī al-qawāfī] "اعلم ان الشعر تتعاقب عليه اشيا فمنها ما هو ملازم ومنها ما هو مفارق ..."
4. p.79-p.118 : al-Fuṣūl fī al-qawāfī / Abū Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn al-Mubārak Ibn al-Dahhān al-Naḥwī.
3. p.77-p.79 : [poetic excerpts by the author] / Abū Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn al-Mubārak Ibn al-Dahhān al-Naḥwī.
2. p.63-p.77 : Jumlah mukhtaṣarah fī ʻilm al-qawāfī / Abū Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn al-Mubārak Ibn al-Dahhān al-Naḥwī.
1. p.1-p.62 : al-Bāb fī ʻilm al-ʻarūḍ / Abū Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn al-Mubārak Ibn al-Dahhān al-Naḥwī
Fine copy of a selection of concise works by Abū Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn al-Mubārak Ibn al-Dahhān al-Naḥwī (d.1174) on versification, metre and rhyme. Final work ends abruptly.

On front flyleaf, label with ex libris of James Heyworth-Dunne (d.1974), stamped with inventory numbers, "Ex Libris | J. Heyworth-Dunne | D. Lit. (London) | No.7779" ; several former owners' marks on 'title page' (p.1) including ownership statement in name of Aḥmad al-Sinnārī [al-Sanārī] al-Mālikī [?] ( احمد السناري المالكي ) accompanied by oval seal impression, ownership statement in name of Aḥmad Abū Ḥāfiẓ al-Qalʻī al-Ḥanafī ( احمد ابو حافظ القلعي الحنفي ) accompanied by octagonal seal impression, ownership / purchase statement (with price) in name of the aforementioned owner's son Nuʻmān ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Qalʻī al-Ḥanafī ( نعمان بن المرحوم الشيخ احمد القلعي الحنفي ) dated 15 Rabīʻ I 1189 [ca. 16 May 1775], and partially illegible statement in name of Aḥmad al-Bujayrimī al-Shāfiʻī ( احمد البجيرمي الشافعي ) dated 1190 [1776 or 7] ; kabīkaj invocation on 'title page' (p.1) "لبيك كبيكج" ; UM Library inscription on p.3 "Dunning | Heyworth-Dunne | 6-13-51 | 71955" ; glosses and occasional marginal corrections.
كتاب الدروس في علمي العروض والقوافي,
